Upload and manage your CSV meter files

Upload a CSV file to get started
Select the appropriate workflow for your CSV file
For verifying and checking off meters from your list
For matching scanned QR codes against your meter database
Serial number \'%s\' not found in MeterCheck data. Add it to continue the workflow:
Invalid file type. Please select a CSV file.
File appears to be corrupted or unreadable
A file with this name already exists

üìã Instructions:

1. Upload a CSV file with the following required columns:
 ‚Ä¢ Number - Meter identification number
 ‚Ä¢ SerialNumber - Unique serial number
 ‚Ä¢ Place - Location/address of the meter
 ‚Ä¢ Registered - Boolean (true/false, yes/no, 1/0)

2. After upload, choose processing destination:
 ‚Ä¢ MeterCheck - For meter verification workflow
 ‚Ä¢ Match - For matching operations

3. Only valid CSV files can be processed

Supported file types: CSV, TXT
Maximum file size: 10MB
Add your meter data from a CSV file to get started

Serial number '%s' was not found in the loaded meter data.

This could mean:
‚Ä¢ The meter is from a different batch
‚Ä¢ The serial number was misread
‚Ä¢ The meter data hasn't been loaded

Serial number '%1$s' was not found in the loaded meter data.

This could mean:
‚Ä¢ The meter is from a different batch
‚Ä¢ The serial number was misread
‚Ä¢ The meter data hasn't been loaded

Expected: %1$s Scanned: %2$s The scanned QR code doesn\'t match the expected meter serial number, and no other meters with this serial number were found in the system. Please verify you\'re scanning the correct meter.
Expected: %1$s Scanned: %2$s The scanned QR code doesn\'t match the expected meter, but we found other meters with this serial number.
Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action cannot be undone.

You have %d meters pending scan. Consider checking them first.

Export your meter data to CSV format with filtering options
Input stream is null for file: %s
Missing required SerialNumber column in file: %s
Line %1$d has insufficient columns (%2$d vs required %3$d)
Line %d has blank serial number field
Processed %1$s: %2$d serial numbers parsed, %3$d lines skipped

üìã CSV Format Requirements:

Required Column:
‚Ä¢ SerialNumber - Unique serial number (e.g., SN123456789, 2203312)

Example CSV Content:
SerialNumber
2203312
SN987654321
MTR-001-ABC

Notes:
‚Ä¢ Header row is required
‚Ä¢ Comma-separated values
‚Ä¢ Text containing commas should be quoted
‚Ä¢ Empty lines are ignored
‚Ä¢ Invalid lines are skipped with warnings

üìã Instructions:

1. Upload a CSV file with the following required column:
 ‚Ä¢ SerialNumber - Unique serial number identifier

2. After upload, choose processing destination:
 ‚Ä¢ MeterCheck - For serial number verification workflow
 ‚Ä¢ Match - For matching operations

3. Only valid CSV files can be processed

Supported file types: CSV, TXT
Maximum file size: 10MB

Example CSV format:
SerialNumber
SN123456789
2203312
MTR-001-ABC
‚úÖ Valid CSV format - SerialNumber column found
‚ùå Invalid CSV format - SerialNumber column required
CSV processed successfully - %d serial numbers found
Configure where meters will be scanned
No locations configured. Add locations where you will scan meters.
Serial number not found in database
No locations configured. Please add locations first.
